name: Unblinking Flame Feint
text: You move as swiftly and unpredictably as a flickering flame.
prerequisites: Int 13; Wis 13; Combat Expertise; Perfect Style; base attack bonus +9 or monk level 9th.
benefit: While using Perfect Style, you can use your Wisdom modifier in place of your Charisma modifier when attempting Bluff checks to feint. You can spend 1 ki point as a swift action to gain the benefits of Improved Feint for 1 round.
staminaText: You can spend 2 stamina points instead of 1 ki point when using Unblinking Flame Feint.
text_zh: 你的行动如同闪烁的火焰一般迅捷而又不可预测，从而把敌人打得措手不及。
prerequisites_zh: 智力13，感知13，寓守于攻，无瑕流，BAB+9或9级武僧等级。
benefit_zh: 若你正在使用无瑕流，则能够在尝试使用唬骗检定进行虚招时，使用感知调整值替代魅力调整值。你能够以迅捷动作花费1点气，来在1轮内获得精通虚招的好处。
staminaText_zh: 你可以在使用业火袭时消耗2点耐力而不是1点气。
